amendment.description: Amendment added municipalities to the list of entities eligible for the National Capacity Environmental Education Grant Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 110-854 to allow municipalities to be eligible for the National Capacity Environmental Education Grant Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Welch (VT) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Welch (VT).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Welch (VT) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
